ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (COVID-19 â€” Wage and Rent Subsidies Periods 14 to 16)
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (COVID-19 WAGE AND RENT SUBSIDIES PERIODS 14 TO 16 ) in order to prescribe three additional four-week periods under which eligible organizations can receive continued support through the Canada Emergency Wage Subsidy and Canada Emergency Rent Subsidy from March 14 to June 5, 2021.
